content:
designer permits you to knit these for sale

finished measurements
these measurements were taken unstretched around the upper palm of the completed knucks they have a lot of stretch and fit a wide range of sizes

kids approx 5 25 inches
women approx 7 inches
men approx 8 inches

description from knitty com

reluctant to commit to the permanence of a knuckle tattoo but yearning to express yourself here is your solution embroider the eight-letter text that says you onto these quick-to-knit fingerless gloves and the world will know just what you stand for

knit your knucks from the knuckles down -- a fast knit on size four needles working  down allows you to split the yarn into two balls and knit until the balls run out -- achieve extra-long matched-length gloves with no anxiety choose between a ribbed cuff with a sewn cast-off and a textured cuff with a crab stitch edging included are simple tutorials for both learn something new yo

find pattern support for knucks and a place to post your photos at the wooly wonder forums 1 text ideas here 2 1 http //woolywonder com/forums 2 http //www woolywonder com/knucks/knitknux htm
